event.title: Many sex workers to sex doll brothels
event.description:
Allissa, a sex worker in the legal brothel Sheris Ranch in Nevada, is outraged that, unlike legal brothels who can not compete openly for fear of violating the lawyers’ laws, sex doll brothels may have been able to advertise openly on billboards (as recently with Vancouver). She also believes that they pose a serious security threat.

Sex Dolls: With the growing technology, cheap sex dolls have become more popular among the masses. Not only do they provide the same sexual pleasure as a human being, they do not cheat. So no heartbreak. Nowadays, sex dolls are supplied with a full silicone construction with lifelike properties and internal skeletons that provide natural freedom of movement, Lelo explained.

For these reasons, sex doll brothels are anything but ordinary. Even so, there was great outcry over the mere prospect of lifelike sex dolls brothels, especially in the legal sex industry in the United States. (Prostitution is illegal in the US, except in a certain number of districts in Nevada, where it is heavily regulated.) And there are already male and female sex dolls.

It is safe to say that the main objection of many sex workers to sex doll brothels is not moral or philosophical, but economic.It is true that it costs less to masturbate in a rented piece of silicone than to have sex with a legal prostitute.
